channel.title: Electron & 2 Carloop CAN Hitch's
channel.description: has anyone done this? i figured you wouldn't need the carloop adaptor, and then when its wired up can you use it with canutils? or how would you bring up the interfaces?

item.title: Electron & 2 Carloop CAN Hitch's
item.dc:creator: dubb45
item.description:
Basically want to connect to Can C & canIHS on my Charger at the same time through the obdii port. I have an OBDII shell I can use to so assuming it should work lol

Read full topic

item.title: Electron & 2 Carloop CAN Hitch's
item.dc:creator: cyclin_al1
item.description:
@dubb45, are you looking at hooking up both CAN hitches to the same CANbus at the same time?

If you are doing that, I would assume the only extra thing to pay attention to is to use a unique message ID for each interface.
(or “PID Type” in the tables referenced here: OBD-II PIDs - Wikipedia)

Read full topic
